favourite.article: Praise the Lord the Bible is a will!

It is a great privilege to us to be chosen by God before the foundation of the world. We are not of our own, we are of His. God could not be wrong in choosing us. No matter what situation we may have never forget that God has owned us and He will never leave us.

Hallelujah! We have called this hymn every time when there is a guest in our home gathering! It is a great song to warmly welcome anyone and preach them a gospel. We even changed the "friend" in the last verse to the guest's name.
Praise the Lord that we have been chosen before the began, that's why we are in this meeting to build up the Body Of Christ.
